name: EMP50
comments: Subjects received 50 mg empagliflozin containing [14C]-radiolabelled empagliflozin

name: C14EMP
comments: A mixture of empagliflozin and [14C]-empagliflozin was reconstituted with polyethylene glycol 400/water (60/40, w/w) at a concentration of 5 mg/g to provide a radioactive dose of ~100 mCi per subject (49.1 mg empagliflozin plus 0.9 mg [14C]-empagliflozin, adjusted according to the specific activity). The specific activity of [14C]-empagliflozin was 2.13 mCi/mg.
